comment_text:
Thank you for your Original Content, /u/yaph! I've added [your flair](https://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/wiki/flair#wiki_oc_flair) as gratitude. **Here is some important information about this post:**

* [Author's citations](https://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/comments/8vjaad/stack_overflow_survey_2018_language_preferences_oc/e1nqrzs/) for this thread
* [All OC posts by this author](https://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/search?q=author%3A"yaph"+title%3A[OC]&sort=new&restrict_sr=on)

I hope this sticky assists you in having an informed discussion in this thread, or inspires you to [remix](https://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/wiki/index#wiki_remixing) this data. For more information, please [read this Wiki page](https://www.reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/wiki/flair#wiki_oc_flair).

Data source: Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2018 - https://www.kaggle.com/stackoverflow/stack-overflow-2018-developer-survey

Tools: matplotlib (Python) - https://matplotlib.org/

You find the code to create this plot in this notebook: http://ramiro.org/notebook/sos2018-technology-preferences/

The notebook also shows similar plots for platforms, databases and frameworks.
